title: IT Tech Packaging registers 36.1% decline in Q1 2022 revenue - Packaging Gateway
content: IT Tech Packaging registers 36.1% decline in Q1 2022 revenue  Packaging Gateway
description: IT Tech Packaging has reported that its revenue for the first quarter (Q1) of fiscal 2022 declined 36.1% to approximately $15.48m compared to the corresponding period the prior year.
